metadata.title: CVE-2020-29396 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A sandboxing issue in Odoo Community 11.0 through 13.0 and Odoo Enterprise11.0 through 13.0, when running with Python 3.6 or later, allows remoteauthenticated users to execute arbitrary code, leading to privilegeescalation.

criterions.comment: odoo package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and needs fixing.
